Roll 1d4 to see what type of spirit is drawn to you. You gain the listed benefit for the action. If you attempt to use a different action, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:6] or the action is lost.

1 Warrior You must attempt a Strike. You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack roll and a +2 status bonus to damage, or a +6 status bonus to damage if you are at least cursebound 3.

2 Adept You must attempt a Perception check or a skill action. You gain a +1 status bonus to the check, or a +2 status bonus if you are cursebound 3.

3 Sage You must attempt to Cast a Spell. You gain a status bonus to the spell's damage or healing equal to the spell's rank, or equal to the spell's rank + 3 if you are at least cursebound 3.

4 Wanderer You must attempt a Stride action, or a Fly, Climb, or Burrow action if you have the relevant speed. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed for the action, or a +20-foot status bonus if you are at least cursebound 3.

Effect: Memory of Skill.name: Effect: Memory of Skill
Effect: Memory of Skill.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7UDWeLq8OAL04gHR]{Memory of Skill}

You temporarily increase your proficiency rank with that skill by one step.

Effect: Mental Balm.name: Effect: Mental Balm
Effect: Mental Balm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pEFcWRYiWLSjxvkW]{Mental Balm}

You or one ally within 30 feet gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves against emotion effects for 1 minute.

Effect: Mentor of Legends.name: Effect: Mentor of Legends
Effect: Mentor of Legends.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JBjRGWVtVaxLckfH]{Mentor of Legends}

The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Metallic Skin.name: Efecto: Piel Metálica
Effect: Metallic Skin.description: Fortaleces tus resistencias naturales con metal elemental, cubriendo tu piel con metal grueso. Obtienes una bonificación de estado de +2 a la CA y una resistencia de 10 al daño físico (excepto adamantino), pero sufres una penalización de -10 pies a la velocidad. Si recibes daño de fuego mientras esta habilidad está activa, hasta el final de tu siguiente turno, infliges un @Damage[2d6[fire]] daño adicional con todos tus golpes cuerpo a cuerpo desarmados.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).name: Efecto: Debilitaciones metódicas (ponerse a cubierto)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Debilitaciones metódicas}

El objetivo no obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia a la CA debido a Alzar un escudo, la cobertura menor o la cobertura normal; obtiene un bonificador +2 por circunstancia a la CA tan sólo debido a la cobertura mayor o a Ponerse a cubierto.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.name: Efecto: Debilitaciones metódicas (flanqueo)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.description: El objetivo no puede flanquear ni contribuir al flanqueo.

Effect: Mirrored Aegis.name: Effect: Mirrored Aegis
Effect: Mirrored Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.lJAQPRT2t8IABR4v]{Mirrored Aegis}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Effect: Mirrored Wall.name: Effect: Mirrored Wall
Effect: Mirrored Wall.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EKEZGfOBKTNWTFDe]{Mirrored Wall}

You take a circumstance penalty to your Fortitude save.

Effect: Moisture Bath.name: Effect: Moisture Bath
Effect: Moisture Bath.description: you gain fire and cold resistance equal to half your level.

Effect: Monarch Wings.name: Efecto: Alas de Monarca
Effect: Monarch Wings.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IzNyByUBNH94MDOr]{Fey Ascension}

Obtienes una Velocidad de vuelo igual a tu Velocidad mientras has manifestado tus alas.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Efecto: Cazador de monstruos
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Cazador de monstruos}

Obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a vuestra siguiente tirada de ataque contra dicha presa.

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Efecto: Guardián contra los monstruos
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Guardián contra los monstruos}

Obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a tu siguiente tirada de salvación contra dicha criatura en particular y a tu CA contra el siguiente ataque que dicha criatura os haga.

Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.name: Efecto: Estrategia de la montaña (Golpe Crítico)
Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.description: Marca un objetivo que te ha hecho un golpe crítico.

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Efecto: Fortaleza de montaña
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: Te concentras en tu conexión con la tierra y llamas a la montaña para bloquear los ataques contra ti. Obtienes una bonificación de circunstancia +2 a la CA hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno.

Effect: Mountaineering Training.name: Effect: Mountaineering Training
Effect: Mountaineering Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bAXkEXAlnBx78S7t]{Mountaineering Training}

You gain a climb Speed of 20 feet.

Effect: Multifaceted Will.name: Effect: Multifaceted Will
Effect: Multifaceted Will.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.LBfLDfLnCFn1iy5h]{Multifaceted Will}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against spells with the chosen tradition trait.

Effect: Mutagenist Field Benefit.name: Effect: Mutagenist Field Benefit
Effect: Mutagenist Field Benefit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tvdb1jkjl2bRZjSp]{Mutagenist}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Intelligence modifier plus half your level.

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Efecto: Arma mutada
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Selecciona un ataque desarmado que obtuviste con Living Weapon. El dado de daño de ese ataque aumenta en un paso hasta el final de tu turno. Además, elige que el ataque obtenga un alcance de 10 pies hasta el final de tu turno o que obtengas una bonificación de estado +1 a las tiradas de ataque con el ataque desarmado elegido hasta el final de tu turno.

Effect: Mythic Allies.name: Effect: Mythic Allies
Effect: Mythic Allies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lx7JtAhIn3aJ6WbP]{Mythic Allies}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your attack rolls, defenses, and a number of additional Hit Points equal to the origin's level. The next Strike you make gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the attack roll.

Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonu.name: Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonus)
Effect: Mythic Allies (Circumstance Bonu.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Lx7JtAhIn3aJ6WbP]{Mythic Allies}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll.

Effect: Nanite Surge.name: Efecto: Oleada de Nanites
Effect: Nanite Surge.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge} .

Tus circuitos brillan, iluminando un @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] con luz tenue durante 1 ronda.

Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).name: Efecto: Aumento de Nanites (bonificación)
Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge} .

Obtienes una bonificación de estado +2 a la prueba de habilidad desencadenante.

Effect: Naval Training.name: Effect: Naval Training
Effect: Naval Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.zuTNF3UEr0ZNleqR]{Naval Training}

You gain a swim Speed of 20 feet.

Effect: Nothing Personal.name: Effect: Nothing Personal
Effect: Nothing Personal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gDvLmqxAtxY3LVaH]{Nothing Personal}

Your first strike each round deals an extra die of weapon damage to the marked target. This increases to 2 die at level 14, and 3 die at level 20.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.name: Efecto: Magia de sangre de ninfa
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.5Wxjghw7lHuCxjZz]{Bloodline: Nymph}

La gracia de ninfa acentúa tus movimientos y distrae a tus enemigos, ya sea otorgándote una bonificación de estado de +1 a las pruebas de Diplomacia durante 1 ronda o imponiendo una penalización de estado de -1 a las salvaciones de Voluntad de un objetivo durante 1 ronda.

Effect: Oath of the Defender.name: Effect: Oath of the Defender
Effect: Oath of the Defender.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.imBsp1Tg7KMut4Lf]{Oath of the Defender}

You gain resistance to damage dealt by creatures with the chosen trait.

Effect: Ocean's Balm.name: Efecto: Bálsamo del océano
Effect: Ocean's Balm.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1gtWb6lKWMw1Wp1q]{Ocean's Balm}

Obtienes resistencia al fuego.

Effect: Offensive Boost.name: Efecto: Impulso ofensivo
Effect: Offensive Boost.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.F8oXHnu9iNTcpXbJ]{Offensive Boost}

Tus mejoras hacen que cualquier Golpe que dependa de tu innovación cause 1d6 de daño adicional, con un tipo determinado por el impulso que elijas. Si tu innovación es la armadura, el impulso se aplica a tus ataques cuerpo a cuerpo con un arma que elijas durante los preparativos diarios; Si tu innovación es una construcción, el impulso se aplica a los ataques de tu compañero de construcción.

Effect: Offer Story.name: Effect: Offer Story
Effect: Offer Story.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7wQe43fSCG9DSWdj]{Offer Story}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and Will saves.

If the origin has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yRT94fGPaS1M9f9I]{Illuminating Stories}, then you can choose to gain a status bonus on skill checks to Recall Knowledge instead.

If the origin has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3GmgFUL2xzt5vhCz]{Raging Stories}, you can choose to deal additional fire damage with your melee Strikes instead.

Effect: One Moment till Glory.name: Effect: One Moment till Glory
Effect: One Moment till Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IEBBHnI7wWRt44KG]{One Moment till Glory}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throw.

Effect: One with the Spirits.name: Effect: One with the Spirits
Effect: One with the Spirits.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OxdlGZ1rndxalf6X]{One with the Spirits}

You gain fast healing 5 and you become concealed. Your Strikes gain the benefits of a ghost touch property rune. Whenever you deal damage with a Strike, you can choose to have that Strike deal spirit damage, rather than its usual damage type.

Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.name: Effect: Ongoing Selfishness
Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRMW0EiuOO20pzG2]{Ongoing Selfishness}

You gain resistance to all further damage from the triggering enemy until the end of the turn on which you used the reaction. This resistance is equal to half your Selfish Shield resistance.

Effect: Oni Form.name: Effect: Oni Form
Effect: Oni Form.description:
Your horns flash briefly as you grow in size and ferocity. Your size increases to Large, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1}. This doesn't change your Speed, reach, or other statistics except as noted here. Your worn equipment automatically resizes to suit your new form, though it immediately returns to its original size if it leaves your possession.

This form is the same age and body type as your true form and has roughly analogous physical traits, such as hair color. Using Oni Form counts as creating a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} use of Deception.

You can Sustain your Oni Form for up to 10 minutes, though you must then spend at least 10 minutes in your natural form before using Oni Form again.

Effect: Only You and I.name: Effect: Only You and I
Effect: Only You and I.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.8r9ePG6BnrnO6YE1]{Only You and I}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls made against the exemplar. Whenever you miss the exemplar with a Strike, they heal 1d8+5 Hit Points.

Effect: Oracular Warning.name: Effect: Oracular Warning
Effect: Oracular Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative).name: Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative)
Effect: Oracular Warning (Initiative).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll. If you are cursebound 2 when you use Oracular Warning, the bonus increases to +3, and if you are cursebound 3, the bonus increases to +4.

Effect: Orchard's Endurance.name: Efecto: Resistencia del huerto
Effect: Orchard's Endurance.description: Obtienes resistencia al daño contundente y perforante. Además, lanzas cheques planos para recuperarte del daño persistente dos veces y obtienes el resultado más alto; Este es un efecto fortuna.

Effect: Overclock Senses.name: Effect: Overclock Senses
Effect: Overclock Senses.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xCi23uEFef9jhtlM]{Overclock Senses}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against ranged attacks and to Reflex saving throws.

Effect: Overdrive.name: Efecto: Sobremarcha
Effect: Overdrive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3D9kGfwg4LUZBR9A]{Overdrive}

Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier on a critical success, or half your Intelligence modifier on a success. On a failure, your Strikes deal 1 additional fire damage instead.

Effect: Overdrive Ally.name: Efecto: Aliado Overdrive
Effect: Overdrive Ally.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NBvhmNqneeok7ZOr]{Overdrive Ally}

Hasta el final de su siguiente turno, los Golpes de ese aliado causan daño adicional equivalente a la mitad de tu modificador de Inteligencia, o tu modificador de Inteligencia completo si estabas en sobremarcha crítica.

Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.name: Efecto: Overdrive Ally (Overdrive compartido)
Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U0XX0Mm2MbZcuNK2]{Shared Overdrive}

La primera vez que usas Overdrive Ally durante un Overdrive determinado, el efecto dura el resto de la duración de tu Overdrive, en lugar de solo hasta el final del siguiente turno del objetivo.

Effect: Overextending Feint.name: Effect: Overextending Feint
Effect: Overextending Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9CaaU5szcf3mtJXD]{Overextending Feint}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against the opponent.

Effect: Oversized Throw.name: Effect: Oversized Throw
Effect: Oversized Throw.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tIE2umG4rQOxm8D8]{Oversized Throw}

You gain a ranged Strike. It is a simple ranged weapon that deals 1d10 bludgeoning damage, has a range increment of 20 feet, and has the thrown weapon trait. The damage increases to 2d10 bludgeoning damage if you have weapon specialization in simple weapons, or 3d10 bludgeoning if you have greater weapon specialization.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Efecto: Campo de vigilancia
Effect: Overwatch Field.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t03Tc5I4B8RHsyqs]{Overwatch Dedication}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

Effect: Packed with Flavor.name: Effect: Packed with Flavor
Effect: Packed with Flavor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U1EMvL3PbEQZXqLy]{Packed with Flavor}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Pale Horse.name: Effect: Pale Horse
Effect: Pale Horse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qPlv8HwtoO2fAjkj]{Pale Horse}

You gain resistance 10 to fire, poison, or void damage.

Effect: Panache.name: Efecto: estilo
Effect: Panache.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}

Mientras tengas estilo, obtienes un bono de estado de +5 pies a tus velocidades y un bono de circunstancia +1 a las pruebas de Tumble Through o para realizar cualquier acción que te dé estilo debido a tu estilo.

Effect: Pass Vengeful Judgment.name: Effect: Pass Vengeful Judgment
Effect: Pass Vengeful Judgment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lL5MxRUFqbzS6jDm]{Pass Vengeful Judgment}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks against creatures in the area within a 10-mile radius of where Pass Vengeful Judgment was used.

Effect: Path of the Tempest.name: Effect: Path of the Tempest
Effect: Path of the Tempest.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.O0XJIvMGK36yg9TJ]{Path of the Tempest}

Your familiar summons winds that speed up and protect you. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your turn. When you Stride this turn, you don't trigger reactions. In addition, you don't need to Stride before a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} this turn.

Effect: Perfect Protection.name: Effect: Perfect Protection
Effect: Perfect Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oYzkopbXguiwfNTx]{Perfect Protection}

When you critically hit the origin, they roll a DC 14 flat check. On a success, it becomes a normal hit. If the origin's armor has a fortification rune, they roll only one flat check, but the DC is 12 (or 10 if it's a greater fortification rune).

Effect: Perfect Resistance.name: Efecto: Resistencia Perfecta
Effect: Perfect Resistance.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

Después de usar un hechizo de ki de Estudiante de perfección, la resistencia aumenta para ser igual a tu nivel durante 1 ronda.

Effect: Phenom Verve.name: Effect: Phenom Verve
Effect: Phenom Verve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4YqmeJQwnrG1Lg07]{Phenom's Verve}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with one-handed firearms and one-handed melee weapons.

Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.name: Efecto: Magia de Sangre de Fénix
Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.TWR1wbPJuCLnGdFZ]{Bloodline: Phoenix}

Elige que tú o el objetivo del hechizo ganen puntos de vida temporales iguales al rango del hechizo durante 1 ronda.

Effect: Pierce the Eye.name: Effect: Pierce the Eye
Effect: Pierce the Eye.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.18eGaH5rWEXpDlgk]{Pierce the Eye}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to Medicine checks to Administer First Aid to stop the bleeding.

Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner.name: Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner
Effect: Pinpoint Poisoner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XtIPmZ3Ihq5NJHP2]{Pinpoint Poisoner}

The creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.

Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.name: Efecto: Desafío del Pistolero
Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yOyMlFGAgLfRas8m]{Pistolero's Challenge}

Tanto tú como el oponente obtienen una bonificación de estado de +2 a las tiradas de daño con golpes realizados entre sí. Si eres un maestro en la habilidad que usaste para la prueba, la bonificación de estado a las tiradas de daño aumenta a +3, y si eres legendario, aumenta a +4.

Effect: Plane-Stepping Dash.name: Effect: Plane-Stepping Dash
Effect: Plane-Stepping Dash.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s6C5jtru8j0sONa6]{Plane-Stepping Dash}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Plant Banner.name: Effect: Plant Banner
Effect: Plant Banner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xEeCaJsQeDtRAVk1]{Plant Banner}

You gain 4 temporary Hit Points, plus an additional 4 temporary Hit Points if the origin is 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter.

Effect: Play to the Crowd (AC Bonus).name: Effect: Play to the Crowd (AC Bonus)
Effect: Play to the Crowd (AC Bonus).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KrYvJ5n06yHCipCZ]{Play to the Crowd}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Play to the Crowd (Attack Roll B.name: Effect: Play to the Crowd (Attack Roll Bonus)
Effect: Play to the Crowd (Attack Roll B.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KrYvJ5n06yHCipCZ]{Play to the Crowd}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll.

Effect: Play to the Crowd (Temporary Hit.name: Effect: Play to the Crowd (Temporary Hit Points)
Effect: Play to the Crowd (Temporary Hit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KrYvJ5n06yHCipCZ]{Play to the Crowd}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your character level.

Effect: Pointed Question.name: Effect: Pointed Question
Effect: Pointed Question.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xccOiNL2W1EtfUYl]{Pointed Question}

You gain a circumstance bonus to your Perception DC if the marked creature attempts to Lie to you, and the marked creature is off-guard to the Strike you make against it using Devise a Stratagem.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Efecto: Arma Venenosa
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Se aplica cuando aplicas un veneno creado con @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon} .

Effect: Portentous Spell.name: Effect: Portentous Spell
Effect: Portentous Spell.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rRbMOxX1QTHIIwAi]{Portentous Spell}.

Any creature that attempts to use a reaction triggered by your Cast a Spell activity takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and skill checks rolled as part of the reaction.

Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.name: Effect: Portents of the Haruspex
Effect: Portents of the Haruspex.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tz0gvfTwcDq0yEfg]{Portents of the Haruspex}

Roll 1d12 to determine the damage type. The next time before the end of your next turn that you or your allies deals that damage type to an enemy, that enemy has weakness equal to your level against that damage.

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Efecto: Arma tocada por la oración
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description: El arma elegida inflige 1d6 de daño de vitalidad extra.

Effect: Precious Ammunition.name: Effect: Precious Ammunition
Effect: Precious Ammunition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MlxfNv98LZKfYl64]{Precious Ammunition}

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow or bolt before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.

Effect: Precise Debilitations.name: Efecto: Debilitaciones precisas
Effect: Precise Debilitations.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wvJBIzgS298ZRp6w]{Debilitaciones precisas}

El objetivo sufre 2d6 daño de precisión adicional debido a tus ataques.

Effect: Predictable!.name: Efecto: ¡Predecible!
Effect: Predictable!.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{¡Predecible!}

Obtienes un bonificador por circunstancia a tu CA y a tu siguiente tirada de salvación contra la criatura. Con un fallo crítico sufres un penalizador -1 por circunstancia en su lugar.

Effect: Predictable! (Saving Throw).name: Efecto: ¡Predecible! (tirada de salvación)
Effect: Predictable! (Saving Throw).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{¡Predecible!}

Obtienes un bonificador por circunstancia a tu siguiente tirada de salvación contra la criatura. Con un fallo crítico sufres un penalizador -1 por circunstancia en su lugar.

Effect: Premonition of Clarity.name: Effect: Premonition of Clarity
Effect: Premonition of Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2h8a6pKhXTXwpJjP]{Premonition of Clarity}

Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine.name: Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine
Effect: Prepare Elemental Medicine.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NMbOfl885pn0Yzu9]{Prepare Elemental Medicine}

You gain a circumstance bonus to saves against an affliction, or a –1 circumstance penalty on a critical failure.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qaiwbAb1PaKrZ2O0]{Energy Fortification} and use Occultism to Prepare Elemental Medicine, the recipient gains resistance and weakness to vitality damage and void damage based on the element you chose.

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Efecto: Posición predominante
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

Dejas la postura en la que estabas, ganando un bonificador de circunstancia +4 a la tirada de salvación desencadenante o a tu CA contra el ataque desencadenante.

Effect: Pride in Arms.name: Effect: Pride in Arms
Effect: Pride in Arms.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CCY6VsGjp5fdmM6K]{Pride in Arms}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier.

Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Efecto: Égida Primordial
Effect: Primal Aegis.description: Obtienes resistencia al ácido, al frío, a la electricidad, al fuego, a la vitalidad y al daño del vacío.

Effect: Propulsive Leap.name: Efecto: Salto propulsor
Effect: Propulsive Leap.description: Obtienes una Velocidad de vuelo igual a tu Velocidad o 20 pies, lo que sea mayor.

Effect: Protective Cycle.name: Effect: Protective Cycle
Effect: Protective Cycle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7G1gMSHyMdMGMsF9]{Protective Cycle}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Protective Pose.name: Effect: Protective Pose
Effect: Protective Pose.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.A9WrbBCCdYsmdKGv]{Protective Pose}

You gain resistance to either acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage equal to half the origin's level.

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Efecto: Máscara de espíritu protector
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
Obtienes un bono de circunstancia +1 a la CA hasta el inicio del siguiente turno del lanzador.

Concedido por: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

Effect: Proud Mentor.name: Effect: Proud Mentor
Effect: Proud Mentor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vD3l0Xn4hb7xnQic]{Proud Mentor}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Psi Strikes.name: Efecto: Golpes Psi
Effect: Psi Strikes.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uisI6b7Ua5zSHDwj]{Psi Strikes}

El ataque inflige 1d6 de daño de fuerza adicional.

Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Efecto: relación psíquica
Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}

Obtienes un bonificador +1 de circunstancia a las pruebas de Engaño, Diplomacia e Intimidación, y a las pruebas de Percepción de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Efecto: Magia de sangre psicopomposa (propia)
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PpzH9tJULk5ksX9w]{Bloodline: Psychopomp}

La frontera entre la vida y la muerte se vuelve borrosa para ti. Obtienes una bonificación de estado de +2 a las tiradas de salvación de Fortaleza durante 1 asalto.

Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Efecto: Brisa Purificadora
Effect: Purifying Breeze.description: Obtienes una bonificación de estado de +1 a las tiradas de salvación de Fortaleza.

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Efecto: ¡Haz retroceder a los muertos!
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description: La criatura obtiene un bono de circunstancia +2 a las salvaciones contra efectos originados por muertos vivientes.

Effect: Pushing Wind.name: Effect: Pushing Wind
Effect: Pushing Wind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GxkTe4VM7u26uZGI]{Pushing Wind}

You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to land Speed.

Effect: Race the Skies.name: Effect: Race the Skies
Effect: Race the Skies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MrTULCUsE9naPxXg]{Race the Skies}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Rage.name: Efecto: Furia
Effect: Rage.description:
Requisitos No estás @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigado} ni furioso.

Mientras estás furioso:

  • Aprovechas tu furia interior y comienzas a enfurecerte. Obtienes una cantidad de puntos de vida temporales igual a tu nivel más tu modificador de Constitución.
  • Infliges 2 de daño adicional en ataques cuerpo a cuerpo. Este daño adicional se reduce a la mitad si tu arma o ataque desarmado es ágil.

  • No puedes usar acciones con el rasgo Concentrado a menos que también tengan el rasgo Furia. Puedes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Buscar} mientras estás furioso.

    • La ira dura 1 minuto, hasta que caes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente}, o hasta que termine el encuentro, lo que ocurra primero. No puedes dejar de enojarte voluntariamente. Cuando dejas de enfurecerte, pierdes los Puntos de Golpe Temporales restantes de Furia, y no puedes ganar PG Temporales al usar la acción Furia nuevamente durante 1 minuto.

    @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.MaepXeSHiMoWDm7u]{Efecto: Inmunidad a obtener PG Temporales por Furia}

Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immuni.name: Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immunity
Effect: Rage Temporary Hit Points Immuni.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Ah5g9pDwWF9b9VW9]{Rage}

You can't gain temporary Hit Points from using the Rage action.

Effect: Raise Menhir.name: Efecto: Alzar megalito
Effect: Raise Menhir.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BuVIM4cV7qhVZ2WF]{Alzar megalito}

Elige entre arcano, divino u ocultista; todas las criaturas a 15 pies (4,5 m) o menos del monumento obtienen un bonificador +2 por estatus a sus tiradasde salvación contra los efectos que tienen dicho rasgo.

Effect: Raise Symbol.name: Efecto: símbolo de elevación
Effect: Raise Symbol.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.koER7gKf6CnW5O0s]{Raise Symbol}

Obtienes una bonificación de circunstancia +2 a las tiradas de salvación hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno. Mientras esté elevado, si obtienes un éxito en una tirada de salvación contra un efecto de vitalidad o vacío, obtendrás un éxito crítico.

Effect: Raise the Walls.name: Effect: Raise the Walls
Effect: Raise the Walls.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IBEbFlMmDbGsrN4G]{Raise the Walls}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and any save against force, spirit, vitality, or void effect.

Effect: Rallying Charge (Marshal).name: Effect: Rallying Charge (Marshal)
Effect: Rallying Charge (Marshal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.df4cBV3qZn3qNUmP]{Rallying Charge (Marshal)}

You gain temporary hit points equal to the Charisma modifier of the creature that used Rallying Charge.

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Efecto: Forma desenfrenada
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

Cambias de forma a una forma de hielo vivo durante 1 minuto o hasta que retrocedas. Tu forma de batalla es enorme y tiene las siguientes estadísticas:

  • AC = 18 + tu nivel. Ignora la penalización de prueba de tu armadura y la reducción de velocidad.
  • 20 puntos de vida temporales.
  • Visión con poca luz y olor impreciso 30 pies.
  • Una velocidad de 30, unaVelocidad de vuelo de 40 y no necesitas respirar
  • Cuerpo a cuerpo a mandíbulas, Daño 2d8 perforantes + 1d4 de daño por fuego.
  • Tus ataques desarmados causan 1d4 de daño de fuego adicional, y tus hechizos de fuego causan un dado adicional de daño de fuego (del mismo dado de daño que usa el hechizo).
  • Puedes lanzar @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} como un hechizo innato; el casting esreducido de 2 acciones a 1.
  • Cualquier criatura que te toque o te dañe con un ataque desarmado o con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo sin alcance sufre @Damage[3d6[fire]] daño.
  • Modificador de atletismo de +20, a menos que tu propio modificador sea mayor.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Efecto: Forma desenfrenada (Kitsune de vientos helados)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

Cambias de forma a una forma de hielo vivo durante 1 minuto o hasta que retrocedas. Tu forma de batalla es enorme y tiene las siguientes estadísticas:

  • AC = 18 + tu nivel. Ignora la penalización de prueba de tu armadura y la reducción de velocidad.
  • 20 puntos de vida temporales.
  • Visión con poca luz y olor impreciso 30 pies.
  • Una velocidad de 30, unaVelocidad de vuelo de 40 y no necesitas respirar
  • Cuerpo a cuerpo a mandíbulas, Daño 2d8 perforación + 1d4 daño por frío.
  • Tus ataques desarmados causan 1d4 de daño por frío adicional, y tus hechizos de frío causan un dado adicional de daño por frío (del mismo dado de daño que usa el hechizo).
  • Puedes lanzar @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} como un hechizo innato; el casting esreducido de 2 acciones a 1.
  • Cualquier criatura que te toque o te dañe con un ataque desarmado o con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo sin alcance sufre @Damage[3d6[cold]] daño.
  • Modificador de atletismo de +20, a menos que tu propio modificador sea mayor.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Efecto: Leer Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Una vez que hayas recopilado uno o más hechos menores verdaderos sobre una persona, puedes incorporar estos gestos en tu discurso para presentarte de una manera que les resulte familiar. Esto te otorga un bonificador de circunstancia +1 a tus pruebas de Diplomacia y Engaño con ellos.

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Efecto: Dedicación del Reanimador
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

Los muertos vivientes que animas obtienen un bonificador de estado +1 a las tiradas de ataque, CA, tiros de salvación y pruebas de habilidad durante @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead} .

Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone.name: Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone
Effect: Rebirth in Living Stone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.mNiJvsbyxdLBnTRs]{Rebirth in Living Stone}

You gain temporary Hit Points. You're immune to critical hits and precision damage. Your earth Elemental Blasts deal an additional 1d10 damage of their normal type.

Effect: Recall Under Pressure.name: Efecto: Recuperar bajo presión
Effect: Recall Under Pressure.description: Obtienes una bonificación de estado de +1 a las tiradas de salvación durante el resto del encuentro de combate a medida que tu moral se eleva o una bonificación de estado de +2 si la carta que robaste era del palo de los Libros.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Efecto: Abandono imprudente (Duende)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: Durante el resto de tu turno, si obtienes un fallo o un fallo crítico en una tirada de salvación contra un efecto dañino, obtendrás un éxito.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Efecto: Escudo reflexivo
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Otorgado por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} cuando levantas un escudo que otorga una bonificación de circunstancia +2 a la CA.

Obtienes la bonificación de crisis de tu escudo a las salvaciones de Reflejos.

Effect: Regalia.name: Effect: Regalia
Effect: Regalia.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.DhdLzrcMvB93Rjmt]{Regalia}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear. If the origin has Regalia as an adept implement, this status bonus applies to mental effects, and you gain a status bonus to damage rolls.

If the origin has Regalia as a paragon implement, you aren't off-guard from being flanked unless the origin is flanked, and the status penalty you take from being clumsy, enfeebled, frightened, sickened, or stupefied is reduced by 1, unless the origin is affected by the same condition.

Effect: Regional Specialty.name: Effect: Regional Specialty
Effect: Regional Specialty.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.l1I6bmdm31MPwmWU]{Regional Specialty}

You gain an item bonus against certain saves depending on the chosen element.

  • Wood Against disease and poison effects.
  • Fire Against being doomed or frightened.
  • Earth Against being enfeebled.
  • Metal Against being stupefied.
  • Water Against deafened or drained.

Effect: Relinquish Control.name: Effect: Relinquish Control
Effect: Relinquish Control.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gw8tjM91F6i3fOnR]{Relinquish Control}

You gain a +4 status bonus on saves against spells and effects that give you the controlled condition or attempt to influence your actions.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all Recall Knowledge checks made using Lore skills granted by your attuned apparitions.

Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Efecto: Vigor renovado
Effect: Renewed Vigor.description: Obtienes puntos de vida temporales equivalentes a la mitad de tu nivel más tu modificador de Constitución.

Effect: Renewing Cycle.name: Effect: Renewing Cycle
Effect: Renewing Cycle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.frRJAuuAgDg3RFii]{Renewing Cycle}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Effect: Repel Ambient Magic.name: Effect: Repel Ambient Magic
Effect: Repel Ambient Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SN3sVsU7rD2eBfkf]{Repel Ambient Magic}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the next magical attack, cantrip, or spell that targets you. This bonus increases to +2 at 12th level.

Effect: Replenishment of War.name: Efecto: Reabastecimiento de guerra
Effect: Replenishment of War.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aMef2VM4mSxl0pmy]{Reabastecimiento de guerra}

Obtienes tantos Puntos de Golpe temporales como la mitad de tu nivel, o tantos como tu nivel si el Golpe resulta en un impacto crítico.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Efecto: Valentía resonante
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Otorgado por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Valentía resonante} si tienes éxito crítico en una salvación de Voluntad contra una aptitud de un enemigo.

Obtienes un bonificador +1 por estatus a las salvaciones y tantos Puntos de Golpe temporales como la mitad de tu nivel durante 1 minuto.

Effect: Resounding Finale.name: Efecto: final resonante
Effect: Resounding Finale.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lhSqWHXK1JShUabF]{Final resonante}

Todos los aliados que se estaban beneficiando de sus efectos obtienen tanta resistencia sónica contra el daño desencadenante como el doble del nivel del conjuro.

Effect: Restorative Strike.name: Efecto: Golpe restablecedor
Effect: Restorative Strike.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xUlRLkWnfZ7reej6]{Golpe restablecedor}

Lanza un conjuro de 1 acción de dañar o de curar para curarte a ti mismo, gastando el conjuro con normalidad. Cuando se lanza de esta forma, el conjuro pierde el rasgo manipular. A continuación da un Golpe cuerpo a cuerpo. Si das este Golpe con el arma predilecta de tu dios, obtienes un bonificador +1 por estatus a la tirada de ataque

Si el Golpe acierta, puedes designar como objetivo a una segunda criatura voluntaria para que se cure la misma cantidad debido al conjuro. Dicha criatura puede estar fuera del alcance del conjuro, pero ha de estar adyacente al enemigo al que aciertas.

Effect: Revitalizing Finisher.name: Effect: Revitalizing Finisher
Effect: Revitalizing Finisher.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.83zzG4XBiL5I3NZv]{Revitalizing Finisher}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Roaring Heart.name: Effect: Roaring Heart
Effect: Roaring Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.F6TIEmYYJGmVhMXl]{Roaring Heart}

You gain temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Rod of Rule.name: Effect: Rod of Rule
Effect: Rod of Rule.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZELjVKOohGw3ECwB]{Rod of Rule}

You take –2 circumstance penalty to saves against any of the origin's curriculum or sin spells.

Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good).name: Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good)
Effect: Roll the Bones of Fate (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7Q7HWETkvOM9pYwV]{Roll the Bones of Fate}

You can roll twice on your next attack roll or skill check, taking the higher result.

Effect: Root Magic.name: Efecto: Magia de Raíz
Effect: Root Magic.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.22P7IFyhrF7Fbw8B]{Root Magic}

La primera vez ese día el aliado intenta una tirada de salvación contra un hechizo o un refugio, obtiene un bonificador de circunstancia +1 a la tirada. Este bono aumenta a +2 si eres un experto en Ocultismo o +3 si eres legendario.

Effect: Ruthless Orator.name: Effect: Ruthless Orator
Effect: Ruthless Orator.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7HZaOlJ43QxkDrmO]{Ruthless Orator}

Any hostile creatures within 20 feet take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and spell attack rolls that target you.

Effect: Ruthless Orator (Enemy).name: Effect: Ruthless Orator (Enemy)
Effect: Ruthless Orator (Enemy).description:
Granted by Ruthless Orator

You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and spell attack rolls against the origin.

Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Efecto: Salvaguardar el alma
Effect: Safeguard Soul.description: Obtienes una bonificación de estado de +2 a las tiradas de salvación contra efectos de muerte, efectos de posesión y efectos que intentan manipular o robar tu alma.

Effect: Sanctify Armament.name: Efecto: Santificar armamento
Effect: Sanctify Armament.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Santificar armamento}

El arma obtiene tu rasgo sagrado o sacrílego. También inflige 2d6 daño espiritual adicional a las criaturas del rasgo opuesto.

Effect: Sanguine Revitalization.name: Effect: Sanguine Revitalization
Effect: Sanguine Revitalization.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ZI7TLmmUu7fYLrP0]{Sanguine Revitalization}

You take a circumstance penalty to your Fortitude save.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Efecto: Astrología Saoc
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description: Este efecto te otorga la bonificación o penalización de la circunstancia seleccionada a las pruebas de habilidad.

Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout).name: Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout)
Effect: Scout (Incredible Scout).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aFoVHsuInMOkTZoQ]{Incredible Scout}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Efecto: Aviso del batidor
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Aviso del batidor}

Obtienes un bonificador +1 por circunstancia a sus tiradas de iniciativa.

Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Efecto: Guardianes de cristal marino
Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.description: La criatura obtiene un bonificador de estado +1 a la CA y a las tiradas de salvación.

Effect: Seedpod.name: Efecto: Tegumento
Effect: Seedpod.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWGa6cFSVrASTEfd]{Tegumento}

Con un impacto crítico, el tegumento explota, expulsando una maraña de vegetación que impone un penalizador -10 pies (3 m) por circunstancia a la Velocidad del objetivo hasta el inicio de tu siguiente turno.

Effect: Selfish Shield.name: Efecto: Escudo egoísta
Effect: Selfish Shield.description: Obtienes resistencia contra el daño desencadenante igual a 2 + la mitad de tu nivel, independientemente del tipo de daño.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.name: Efecto: Magia de Sangre de las Sombras
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uoQOm41BVdSo6pAS]{Bloodline: Shadow}

Las sombras se hacen más profundas a tu alrededor o a un objetivo, ya sea otorgando una bonificación de estado de +1 a Sigilo o imponiendo una penalización de estado de -1 a Percepción durante 1 ronda.

Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon.name: Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon
Effect: Shadow Sheath Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ktgzHtKoeUZ5H8KA]{Shadow Sheath}

You load a weapon into the sheath.

Immanence Your Strikes with the weapon deal 2 additional spirit damage per weapon damage die, which increases to 3 per die if the target is off-guard.

Effect: Shadow Sight.name: Efecto: Vista de las Sombras
Effect: Shadow Sight.description: Obtienes visión en la oscuridad mayor durante 1 minuto.

Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Flurry).name: Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Flurry)
Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Flurry).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1JnERVwnPtX620f2]{Animal Companion (Ranger)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Aqhsx5duEpBgaPB0]{Shared Prey}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EHorYedQ8r05qAtk]{Triple Threat}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oHra9QanDFpAZ4hh]{Warden's Boon}

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against the marked creature is –3 (–2 with an agile attack) on your second attack of the turn instead of –5, and –6 (–4 with an agile attack) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of –10.

Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Flurry, Mas.name: Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Flurry, Masterful)
Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Flurry, Mas.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1JnERVwnPtX620f2]{Animal Companion (Ranger)} with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AwxJcaIrutqMcUC8]{Masterful Companion}

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against the marked creature is –2 (–1 with an agile attack) on your second attack of the turn instead of –5, and –4 (–2 with an agile attack) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of –10.

Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Outwit).name: Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Outwit)
Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Outwit).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1JnERVwnPtX620f2]{Animal Companion (Ranger)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Aqhsx5duEpBgaPB0]{Shared Prey}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EHorYedQ8r05qAtk]{Triple Threat}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oHra9QanDFpAZ4hh]{Warden's Boon}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the marked creature, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against the marked creature's attacks.

Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Outwit, Mas.name: Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Outwit, Masterful)
Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Outwit, Mas.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1JnERVwnPtX620f2]{Animal Companion (Ranger)} with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AwxJcaIrutqMcUC8]{Masterful Companion}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the marked creature, and a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the marked creature's attacks.

Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Precision).name: Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Precision)
Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Precision).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1JnERVwnPtX620f2]{Animal Companion (Ranger)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Aqhsx5duEpBgaPB0]{Shared Prey}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EHorYedQ8r05qAtk]{Triple Threat}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oHra9QanDFpAZ4hh]{Warden's Boon}

The first time you hit the marked creature in a round, you deal 1d8 additional precision damage. At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Precision,.name: Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Precision, Masterful)
Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Precision,.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1JnERVwnPtX620f2]{Animal Companion (Ranger)} with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AwxJcaIrutqMcUC8]{Masterful Companion}

The first time you hit the marked creature in a round, you deal 2d8 additional precision damage. At 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

The second time in a round you hit the marked creature, you also deal 1d8 precision damage. At 19th level this extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against the marked creature deals 1d8 precision damage.

Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Vindication.name: Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Vindication)
Effect: Share Hunter's Edge (Vindication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1JnERVwnPtX620f2]{Animal Companion (Ranger)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Aqhsx5duEpBgaPB0]{Shared Prey}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EHorYedQ8r05qAtk]{Triple Threat}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oHra9QanDFpAZ4hh]{Warden's Boon}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your spell attack rolls against the marked creature, and they take a –1 status penalty to their saving throws against divine spells you cast.

Effect: Share Rage.name: Efecto: Furia compartida
Effect: Share Rage.description:
Aprovechas tu furia interior y comienzas a enfurecerte. Obtienes una cantidad de puntos de vida temporales igual a tu nivel más tu modificador de Constitución. Este frenesí dura 1 minuto, hasta que no haya enemigos que puedas percibir, o hasta que caigas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Inconsciente}, lo que ocurra primero. No puedes dejar de enojarte voluntariamente. Mientras estás furioso:

  • Infliges 2 daños adicionales con armas cuerpo a cuerpo y ataques desarmados. Este daño adicional se reduce a la mitad.si tu arma o ataque desarmado es ágil.
  • Recibes una penalización de -1 a AC.

Después de que dejas de enfurecerte, pierdes los puntos de vida temporales restantes de la ira y no puedes volver a enfurecerte durante 1 minuto.

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Efecto: abstinencia compartida
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Abstinencia compartida}

Tus aliados a 20 pies (6 m) o menos de ti que hacen la misma tirada de salvación contra el mismo peligro obtienen también un bonificador +2 por circunstancia a la misma.

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Efecto: claridad compartida
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Claridad compartida}

Los aliados a 15 pies (4,5 m) o menos de ti que hayan fallado la misma tirada de salvación contra el mismo efecto mental podrán también gastar sus reacciones para repetir la tirada fallida con un bonificador +2 por circunstancia.

Effect: Shattershields.name: Efecto: Destrozaescudos
Effect: Shattershields.description: Obtienes una bonificación de circunstancia +1 a la CA.

Effect: Shed Tail.name: Efecto: arrojar cola
Effect: Shed Tail.description: Recibes una penalización de circunstancia de -2 en las pruebas de Equilibrio.

Effect: Sheltering Pulse.name: Effect: Sheltering Pulse
Effect: Sheltering Pulse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HP1DKj4FLwtStzYq]{Sheltering Pulse}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Effect: Shield Ally.name: Efecto: Escudo aliado
Effect: Shield Ally.description: La dureza de tu escudo equipado aumenta en 2.

Effect: Shield Paragon Benefit.name: Effect: Shield Paragon Benefit
Effect: Shield Paragon Benefit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Swy3rjQsdO0wu2kU]{Paragon Benefit (Shield)}

You gain the origin's shield circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Shield Your Eyes.name: Effect: Shield Your Eyes
Effect: Shield Your Eyes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3SiZ4hrNi8aWjP8J]{Shield Your Eyes}

If you critically succeed against the origin's DC with a light or visual trait, it's a success instead.

Effect: Shield from Arrows.name: Effect: Shield from Arrows
Effect: Shield from Arrows.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wzJnJI6d2PaoTZIZ]{Shield from Arrows}

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Shield of Faith.name: Efecto: Escudo de la fe
Effect: Shield of Faith.description:
Obtenido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.w3qyriA1YnzXaas3]{Escudo de la fe}

Obtienes un bonificador +1 por estatus a tu CA

Effect: Shield the Faithful.name: Effect: Shield the Faithful
Effect: Shield the Faithful.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VYwWqm5LZOU7irhY]{Shield the Faithful}

You gain a +1 item bonus to AC and resistance to spirit damage.

Effect: Shielding Wave.name: Effect: Shielding Wave
Effect: Shielding Wave.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.yOk8s1pftOe5I9Sg]{Shielding Wave}

You gain resistance to acid or fire damage.

Effect: Shining Arms.name: Effect: Shining Arms
Effect: Shining Arms.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iAziUKdxgy4k4ypY]{Shining Arms}

When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbrado} for 1 round

Effect: Shining Glory.name: Effect: Shining Glory
Effect: Shining Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tKC06HYkt1XaWk78]{Shining Glory}

You gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks, and the status bonus you receive to saving throws against fear increases to +3.

Effect: Show Off.name: Effect: Show Off
Effect: Show Off.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DMjfZvWD20SGuIO4]{Show-Off}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level (double your level on a critical success).

Effect: Signature Weapon.name: Effect: Signature Weapon
Effect: Signature Weapon.description: Your energy saturates one of your weapons; it might be one inherited or one tied to your history. You gain access to its critical specialization effect. You can spend one action saying the name of your weapon, summoning it into your empty hand if the weapon is unattended and within 1 mile; this is an occult teleportation effect.

Effect: Silk Bracelet.name: Effect: Silk Bracelet
Effect: Silk Bracelet.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bI0PWJ4c3AOcFDWN]{Silk Bracelet}

You gain a -10 foot status penalty to all your Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Siphon Torment.name: Effect: Siphon Torment
Effect: Siphon Torment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XdicxD5jMJ8JSVqk]{Siphon Torment}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level.

Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery.name: Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery
Effect: Sixth Pillar Mastery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sFAqKrzqXQhtrfqN]{Sixth Pillar Mastery}

You have a -1 status penalty to saves against spells from the source, or you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed Strikes.

Effect: Smite.name: Effect: Smite
Effect: Smite.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite}.

Designate one enemy you can see. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that enemy gain a +3 status bonus to damage, increasing to +4 if you have master proficiency with the weapon or unarmed attack you're using for the Strike. If you're holy or unholy and the target has the opposite trait, the bonus is +4 (or +6 if you're a master).

Effect: Smite Good.name: Efecto: Castigar al Bien
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.T5xFirAE8VLL5Lbu]{Smite Good} .

Hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno, tus ataques contra ese enemigo usando el arma en la que habita tu espada aliada causan 4 daños espirituales adicionales si el objetivo es sagrado, aumentando a 6 si tienes competencia maestra con esta arma.

Si el enemigo elegido te ataca antes del inicio de tu siguiente turno, la duración se extiende hasta el final del siguiente turno de ese enemigo. Si el enemigo continúa atacándote cada unoA su vez, la duración continúa extendiéndose.

Effect: Snap Out of It! (Marshal).name: Effect: Snap Out of It! (Marshal)
Effect: Snap Out of It! (Marshal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zbnL5OP4zVaNFcq8]{Snap Out of It! (Marshal)}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Will save.

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Efecto: Dedicación del dúo de francotiradores
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication} .

Cada vez que tú o tu observador golpean con éxito a un objetivo, el otro miembro de tu dúo obtiene una bonificación de circunstancia de +1 por dado de daño del arma en la tirada de daño de su próximo golpe realizado contra ese objetivo antes del final de su siguiente turno.

Effect: Soaring Flight.name: Efecto: Vuelo altísimo
Effect: Soaring Flight.description: Ser un tengu es no estar agobiado por las preocupaciones del mundo de abajo. Te crece un par de alas mágicas o expandes las existentes. Durante 5 minutos, obtienes una velocidad de vuelo igual a tu velocidad terrestre o 20 pies, lo que sea mayor.

Effect: Soothing Vials.name: Effect: Soothing Vials
Effect: Soothing Vials.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BAsKBwlbJAQ6sLhN]{Soothing Vials}

The creature gains a +1 item bonus to the new Will saving throw.

Effect: Soul Vessel Mount.name: Effect: Soul Vessel Mount
Effect: Soul Vessel Mount.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.drcZf55HVsTnnTcF]{Soul Vessel Mount}

You gain a +20-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Soul Well.name: Effect: Soul Well
Effect: Soul Well.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.B8MKXr7mMzOHhTQH]{Soul Well}

Living creatures in the aura die from the dying condition at dying 5 rather than dying 4.

Effect: Soul Well (Additional Damage).name: Effect: Soul Well (Additional Damage)
Effect: Soul Well (Additional Damage).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.B8MKXr7mMzOHhTQH]{Soul Well}

Your spectral dagger deals one additional weapon die of damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Spark Fist.name: Efecto: Puño chispeante
Effect: Spark Fist.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BL2nLeClO30QoQGs]{Spark Fist}

Tu puño pierde el rasgo no letal e inflige daño de fuego adicional con un golpe exitoso.

Effect: Spell Parry.name: Efecto: parada de hechizo
Effect: Spell Parry.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.X9AkydrMdFwg7qIn]{Spell Parry}

Levantas la guardia y obtienes un bonificador de circunstancia +1 a la CA y a las tiradas de salvación contra hechizos que te atacan.

Effect: Spell Protection Array.name: Efecto: Despliegue de protección de conjuros
Effect: Spell Protection Array.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3CPKbiweBRzXAJA9]{Despliegue de protección de conjuros}

Obtienes un bonificador +1 por estatus a las tiradas de salvación contra magia.

Effect: Spin Tale.name: Efecto: Cuento giratorio
Effect: Spin Tale.description: Obtienes una bonificación de estado de +1 a las tiradas de ataque y tiros de salvación contra el villano hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno.

2.label: Target es el villano de Folklorist's Spun Tale

Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: Efecto: Espiral Jurada
Effect: Spiral Sworn.description: Durante 3 rondas, tus golpes y hechizos causan daño adicional contra muertos vivientes, criaturas en posesión de un alma aprisionada o criaturas que has presenciado crear o comandar muertos vivientes. Obtienes una bonificación de estado al daño con tus golpes contra estas criaturas igual a la cantidad de dados de daño del arma. Los hechizos que lanzas desde las ranuras de hechizos obtienen una bonificación de estado al daño contra estas criaturas igual al rango del hechizo; Esta bonificación se aplica sólo a hechizos que causan daño y no tienen unduración.

Effect: Spirit Guide Form.name: Efecto: Forma de guía espiritual
Effect: Spirit Guide Form.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WKRSBu7H9miAwUaR]{Spirit Guide Form}

Te fusionas con tu guía espiritual, convirtiéndose en un ser híbrido con poder físico y espiritual mejorado. Este efecto dura 1 minuto; puedes finalizarlo antes como acción gratuita. Durante este tiempo, no podrás utilizar ninguna otra acción otorgada por este arquetipo. Obtienes las siguientes estadísticas y habilidades, independientemente de tu tipo de guía espiritual.

  • Te vuelves incorpóreo.
  • Obtienes resistencia 10 a todo el daño (excepto fuerza, toque fantasma o vitalidad; doble resistencia frente a no mágico).
  • Visión en la oscuridad.
  • Un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo desarmado del mismo tipo que tu guía espiritual (ya sea garras o mandíbulas), que es el único ataque con el que puedes atacar. Estás entrenado con este ataque. Tu modificador de ataque es +29 o tu modificador de ataque normal sin armas, el que sea mayor. Utilice las estadísticas enumeradas para el tipo de ataque desarmado:
    • Garras (ágil, traidor, delicadeza) 1 , Daño 3d6+5 cortante más 1d6 de fuerza;
    • Mandíbulas (contundente) 1 , Daño 3d10+5 perforante más 1d6 de fuerza.

Effect: Spirit's Mercy.name: Effect: Spirit's Mercy
Effect: Spirit's Mercy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SPtzUNatWJvTK61y]{Spirit's Mercy}

You gain resistance to vitality and void damage (or resistance to all damage if caused by a haunt or incorporeal undead) against the triggering effect. If you expend a spirit wisp, the resistance is equal to twice your level. If you expend a spirit remnant, the resistance is equal to three times the level of the incorporeal undead or haunt from which you gained the remnant.

Effect: Spirits' Interference.name: Effect: Spirits' Interference
Effect: Spirits' Interference.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hjApw8AvYVuqQk2W]{Spirits' Interference} via Ephemeral Effect.

You must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or your attack against the origin misses with no effect.

Effect: Staggering Fire.name: Effect: Staggering Fire
Effect: Staggering Fire.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fngPLUD4Sltho2kn]{Staggering Fire}

You take a –5-foot circumstance penalty to your Speed, or a –10-foot circumstance penalty on a critical hit.

Effect: Starlight Armor.name: Efecto: Armadura de luz estelar
Effect: Starlight Armor.description:
La armadura te otorga resistencia 7 al daño perforante, contundente y cortante. La armadura también arroja luz brillante durante 20 pies (y luz tenue durante los siguientes 20 pies).

Cuando alcanzas el nivel 17, la resistencia aumenta a 10.

Effect: Steal Death.name: Effect: Steal Death
Effect: Steal Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Kb28vpCQNvA6wS1O]{Steal Death}

You gain fast healing as long as you and your apocalypse mount are within 10 feet of each other. If you use Steal Death again, your fast healing increases by 1.

Effect: Steel Yourself!.name: Effect: Steel Yourself!
Effect: Steel Yourself!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4Y7wKFogGB0LZ5ZA]{Steel Yourself!}

You gain temporary Hit Points and a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Stone Body.name: Efecto: Cuerpo de Piedra
Effect: Stone Body.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgg9eNF6MsJPMjyH]{Stone Body}

Obtienes resistencia 10 a todo daño.

Effect: Stoney Deflection.name: Efecto: Desvío pedregoso
Effect: Stoney Deflection.description: Obtienes un bono de circunstancia +2 a la CA y a cualquier defensa contra ser empujado o derribado

Effect: Storied Companion.name: Effect: Storied Companion
Effect: Storied Companion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tQvWDkatsuYsNkds]{Storied Companion}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice the origin's level.

Effect: Strain Mind.name: Efecto: tensar la mente
Effect: Strain Mind.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u8YnTCS2EGoJl90W]{Strain Mind}

Agregas un amplificador que cuesta 1 punto de enfoque al hechizo. En lugar de pagar el coste normal de puntos de concentración, pierdes puntos de vida equivalentes a cuatro veces el rango del hechizo del truco psi amplificado cuando sangras por la nariz o sufres algún otro signo visible de tensión.

Effect: Strained Metabolism.name: Efecto: Metabolismo forzado
Effect: Strained Metabolism.description:
La fisiología acelerada de tu cuerpo requiere cantidades de alimento mayores de lo habitual, lo que te debilita cuando se activa en medio del combate.

Contragolpe leve Tu metabolismo inmediatamente quema las reservas de energía de tu cuerpo, lo que te hace @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Debilitado 1} y ​​@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Torpe 1} hasta que das un bocado a la comida (lo que generalmente requiere 2 acciones de interacción: una para recuperar la comida y otra para consumirla).

Reacción moderada Un hambre voraz destroza tu cuerpo. Estás debilitado 1, torpe 1 y @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigado} hasta que puedas comer una comida completa, lo que requiere al menos 10 minutos.

Contragolpe severo La tensión en su cuerpo es verdaderamente incapacitante. Te vuelves @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Indispuesto 2} cuando las náuseas te atormentan, y también te debilitas 1 y te vuelves torpe 1 hasta que puedas comer una comida completa (lo que requiere que noenfermarse más). Está fatigado hasta que puede descansar toda la noche.

Effect: Strangle.name: Effect: Strangle
Effect: Strangle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lMA3F9SGzGV79P5C]{Strangle}

You must succeed at a DC 10 flat check or lose any action that requires speech. For an action requiring speech that is also a manipulate action, like Casting a Spell with the concentrate and manipulate trait, you just roll a single DC 10 flat check, rather than an additional DC 5 flat check for being grabbed.

Effect: Strategist Stance.name: Effect: Strategist Stance
Effect: Strategist Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fJwsZM6WXwP8EStV]{Strategist Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to Reflex saving throws

Effect: Stymie the Gods.name: Effect: Stymie the Gods
Effect: Stymie the Gods.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.S2YTLXTvqaXhThG6]{Stymie the Gods}

You gain a status bonus to AC and to saving throws against divine spells, as well as the spells, Strikes, and abilities of extraplanar creatures.

Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.name: Efecto: Supercargar ojos protésicos
Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.description: Obtienes visión en la oscuridad y visión en la penumbra, y obtienes un bonificador de estado +1 a las pruebas de Percepción visual.

Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure).name: Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure)
Effect: Surgical Shock (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zzjfENthtRBAjqjQ]{Surgical Shock}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the next attack action you attempt against the target.

Effect: Survive the Wilds.name: Effect: Survive the Wilds
Effect: Survive the Wilds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.NdMSHDtV9G7MbdP2]{Survive the Wilds}

You and all allies in a 15-foot emanation gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against effects with the trait the pelt is attuned to.

Effect: Sword Practice.name: Effect: Sword Practice
Effect: Sword Practice.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AmFv3ClkAVRowHLI]{Tengu Weapon Familiarity}

During your daily preparations, you can practice with a weapon from the sword group that's in your possession. You gain familiarity with that weapon as well. This lasts until you practice with a different sword in the same way.

Effect: Sympathetic Strike.name: Effect: Sympathetic Strike
Effect: Sympathetic Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VOgAiCqC5kpIpLaf]{Sympathetic Strike}

You take –1 circumstance penalty to your saves against the origin's hexes, or a –2 penalty if the triggering Strike was a critical hit.

Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.name: Efecto: Debilitaciones tácticas (sin flanqueo)
Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.description: El objetivo no puede flanquear ni contribuir al flanqueo de sus aliados.

Effect: Tail Toxin.name: Efecto: Toxina de la cola
Effect: Tail Toxin.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ev8OHpBO3xq3Zt08]{Tail Toxin}

Aplicas el veneno de tu cola a un arma perforante o cortante. Si tu próximo golpe con esa arma antes del final de tu siguiente turno golpea e inflige daño, infliges daño de veneno persistente igual a tu nivel al objetivo.

Effect: Tap the Past.name: Effect: Tap the Past
Effect: Tap the Past.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.jsEBrm8SPcsokJLw]{Tap the Past}

You roll a second time and use the higher result. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Targeting Finisher.name: Effect: Targeting Finisher
Effect: Targeting Finisher.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DLkMoVb8qb4qxnx3]{Targeting Finisher}

You gain an effect based on the selected body part.

  • Arm (or another limb used for attacks, such as a tentacle) You are enfeebled 2.
  • Head You are stupefied 2.
  • Legs You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Targeting Finisher (Critical).name: Effect: Targeting Finisher (Critical)
Effect: Targeting Finisher (Critical).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DLkMoVb8qb4qxnx3]{Targeting Finisher}

You gain an effect based on the selected body part.

  • Arm (or another limb used for attacks, such as a tentacle) You are enfeebled 1.
  • Head You are stupefied 1.
  • Legs You take a –5-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Effect: Taunt.name: Effect: Taunt
Effect: Taunt.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.4DYFJ4TUsNkgFBDb]{Taunt}

You take a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and DCs that don't target the origin. If you take a hostile action that doesn't target the origin, you also become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You take a –5-foot status penalty to your Speeds (–10-foot on a critical failure).

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Gravelands).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Gravelands)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Gravelands).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ogso0WqodeFG27L1]{Speak for the Gravelands}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against spells and abilities of haunts and undead creatures.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to the spell's rank.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain darkvision as well as imprecise tremorsense out to 15 feet.

Effect: Terrain Shield.name: Effect: Terrain Shield
Effect: Terrain Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TNRB8IY6Wtk9BoMp]{Terrain Shield}

You gain resistance to physical damage equal to double your level against the triggering Strike.

Effect: Terrifying Mien.name: Effect: Terrifying Mien
Effect: Terrifying Mien.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Egx5NWOVhoaij7a3]{Terrifying Mien}

You gain resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage against Strikes made by creatures with the frightened condition. This resistance is equal to four times the value of that creature's frightened condition.

Effect: The Bigger They Are.name: Effect: The Bigger They Are
Effect: The Bigger They Are.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.azF1RvMTwCPaJr1F]{The Bigger They Are}

You gain weakness to the origin's precision damage.

Effect: The Bigger They Are (Commander).name: Effect: The Bigger They Are (Commander)
Effect: The Bigger They Are (Commander).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Czcdh3pPzQ7y1cV7]{The Bigger They Are}

You gain a circumstance bonus to your check to Reposition, Shove, or Trip.

Effect: The Proud.name: Effect: The Proud
Effect: The Proud.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GF9uIGA947DiC2dR]{The Proud}

You take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the exemplar, and a +1 status bonus to these rolls when targeting the exemplar.

Effect: The Truth As I See It.name: Effect: The Truth As I See It
Effect: The Truth As I See It.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KobkrExhlNeFaNR5]{The Truth As I See It}

When using Deception to Lie, you can roll twice and take the better result.

Effect: Thermal Nimbus.name: Effect: Thermal Nimbus
Effect: Thermal Nimbus.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XJCsa3UbQtsKcqve]{Thermal Nimbus}

You gain cold or fire resistance.

Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.name: Efecto: Invocación de forma de pensamiento
Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pqVG9mRKcXg5Rsjc]{Thoughtform Summoning}

Cada vez que invocas una criatura, puedes elegir crear una construcción psíquica de esa criatura. Esto le otorga una resistencia al daño físico igual a la mitad de su nivel y debilidad 5 a la fuerza y ​​al daño mental.

Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Efecto: Escudo de marea
Effect: Tidal Shield.description: Conjuras la fuerza de las mareas para ganar un bono de circunstancia +4 a la CA hasta el final de tu siguiente turno. Puedes mantener el efecto hasta una duración máxima de 5 rondas.

Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Efecto: impulso del timón
Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Los miembros de tu grupo reciben una bonificación de circunstancia de +5 pies a la velocidad.

Effect: To War!.name: Effect: To War!
Effect: To War!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1fH3M3XaUWWOJZFM]{To War!}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to the origin's level and a +2 status bonus to damage against any foe damaged by the origin's apocalypse mount.

Effect: Tome Adept Benefit.name: Effect: Tome Adept Benefit
Effect: Tome Adept Benefit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.MyN1cQgE0HsLF20e]{Tome}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against the marked creature. If you have the tome's paragon benefit, this bonus applies to all attack rolls.

Effect: Topple Giants.name: Efecto: derribar gigantes
Effect: Topple Giants.description: Cuando un aliado dentro de tu campo de vigilancia intenta @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} un oponente dentro de tu campo de vigilancia y falla, coordinas esfuerzos para proporcionar un bono de circunstancia +2 a la siguiente prueba de Atletismo realizada por un aliado diferente para intentar la misma acción sobre el mismo objetivo antes del siguiente turno de ese objetivo.

Effect: Tough Cookie.name: Effect: Tough Cookie
Effect: Tough Cookie.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RNBr91uB7lX9DldN]{Tough Cookie}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your maximum Hit Points that last for 1 minute.

Effect: Towering Presence.name: Efecto: Presencia Imponente
Effect: Towering Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.t3Eky3ijnAJTiCV5]{Towering Presence}

You increase your size your size to Large. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage.

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Efecto: Inmunidad a Tratar Heridas
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Concedido por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Tratar Heridas}, lo que te vuelve temporalmente inmune a Tratar heridas mientras dure.

Effect: Tributary Circulation.name: Effect: Tributary Circulation
Effect: Tributary Circulation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0HgfWQMIo2UEAlAm]{Tributary Circulation}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Will saves and saves against poison.

Effect: Tripartite Omen.name: Effect: Tripartite Omen
Effect: Tripartite Omen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4mDk8SQyx9dRxy9y]{Tripartite Omen}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic.name: Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic
Effect: Turn Aside Ambient Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.5g0gCXJnUVipYtW0]{Turn Aside Ambient Magic}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. You gain resistance against the chosen damage type equal to half your level.

Effect: Turn Back The Clock.name: Effect: Turn Back The Clock
Effect: Turn Back The Clock.description:
